name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Field Engineer with 8 years of expertise, I possess strong proficiency in **C/C++**, **Python**, and **Java** development, with a focus on **Embedded** systems and **AUTOSAR** architecture. My experience encompasses **In-Vehicle Networking** and **OSI** protocols, enabling seamless communication in complex automotive environments. I am well-versed in real-time threading and networking concepts, including **UDP**, **Multicast**, and **VLAN** technologies, ensuring robust data handling in automotive applications.

I have a solid background in **cloud-native** solutions, virtualization, and **Web Services**, which enable me to design scalable and efficient systems. In previous roles, I've successfully integrated **Hypervisors** and **Containers** for optimized system performance, while leveraging advanced tools for embedded system development. Additionally, I champion customer service and effective communication, ensuring stakeholder alignment and satisfaction throughout project lifecycles.

Furthermore, I carry significant experience in full-stack development, utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. My capabilities extend into **CI/CD** automation and deploying **microservices** architectures, enhancing the overall efficiency and security of applications. I am committed to delivering high-quality solutions that meet compliance standards and drive innovation within the automotive sector.
